title: Fix login bug
description: Users are unable to login with their credentials. The authentication system is returning 401 errors even with valid credentials.

title: Improve dashboard loading
description: Dashboard takes too long to load. We need to optimize the API calls and implement lazy loading.

title: Add dark mode
description: Implement a dark mode theme toggle for better user experience in low-light environments.

title: Refactor API endpoints
description: API endpoints need to be refactored for better maintainability and performance.

title: Update user profile page
description: User profile page needs a redesign with additional fields for better user management.

title: Fix memory leak in analytics
description: Analytics module has a memory leak that causes the application to slow down over time.

title: Add email notifications
description: Implement email notifications for important system events and user actions.

title: Optimize database queries
description: Database queries are slow and need optimization with proper indexing and query restructuring.

title: Create onboarding tutorial
description: New users need a guided tutorial to understand the platform features.

title: Implement two-factor authentication
description: Add two-factor authentication for enhanced security of user accounts.
